com.outbrain.aletheia.datum.consumption

Interface DatumEnvelopeFetcherFactory<TConsumptionEndPoint extends ConsumptionEndPoint>

  • Type Parameters:
    TConsumptionEndPoint - The type of ConsumptionEndPoint this DatumEnvelopeFetcherFactory can build fetchers for.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    InMemoryDatumEnvelopeFetcherFactory, KafkaDatumEnvelopeFetcherFactory

    public interface DatumEnvelopeFetcherFactory<TConsumptionEndPoint extends ConsumptionEndPoint>
    A base interface to be implemented as part of adding a custom ConsumptionEndPoint type to Aletheia. Should a consumption point of type TConsumptionEndPoint be provided, an appropriate DatumEnvelopeFetcherFactory must be registered in order to fetch data from it.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<DatumEnvelopeFetcher> buildDatumEnvelopeFetcher(TConsumptionEndPoint consumptionEndPoint, MetricsFactory metricFactory)
      Builds DatumEnvelopeFetcher capable of fetching DatumEnvelopes from the given consumption end point instance.

    • Method Detail

      • buildDatumEnvelopeFetcher

        List<DatumEnvelopeFetcher> buildDatumEnvelopeFetcher(TConsumptionEndPoint consumptionEndPoint,
                                                   MetricsFactory metricFactory)
        Builds DatumEnvelopeFetcher capable of fetching DatumEnvelopes from the given consumption end point instance.
        Parameters:
        consumptionEndPoint - Describes the source to fetch DatumEnvelopes from.
        metricFactory - The metric factory to report metrics to.
        Returns:
        A list of DatumEnvelopeFetcher that can be used to fetch DatumEnvelopes from the source described by consumptionEndPoint. If the consumption point defines no parallelism (i.e., parallelism = 1) the list will contain only one DatumEnvelopeFetcher, if the parallelism level > 1, the returned list will contain multiple DatumEnvelopeFetcher, that can be used in parallel to increase fetching throughput.
